title: Ticket #6504: Late materialize jobs stop materializing after schedd restart
description:
When the Schedd re-loads late materialization job factories on a restart, it does not impersonate the user when the submit digest has been spooled, this will cause it to fail to open any item data file that is stored in the users's home directory.

Since spooling of the submit digest is the default starting with 8.7.4, the default behavior starting with 8.7.4 is to fail to reload job factories that have item data. On restart the factory will go into a error pause state and cannot be resumed with changing the permissions on the item data file and restarting the schedd.
